transcript:
Executive: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you are trying

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ji sir, good morning.

Executive: Hello. Good morning. Hanji mam.

Customer: Ji ji sir call kiya tha kal aapne?

Customer: Haan maine kal call kiya tha jo Tauseef Raja ka senior hai.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Aur unse meri baat hui thi. Kal unhone ko mujhe koi reply karna tha.

Customer: But unka bhi koi respond nahi aaya. Why?

Executive: Kis kis cheez ka reply?

Customer: Reply jo hai mera jo hai refund ke regarding unko reply karna tha cancellation refund ka.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Hmm. To ek second rukiye.

Executive: Refund ka sir process to aapka start ho gaya hai. Aapke Vivek Mishra se bhi baat hui hogi.

Customer: Haan Vivek Mishra ya kya naam tha unka.

Executive: Haan dono se baat hui hogi. Mohammad Tauseef se bhi aur Vivek Mishra se bhi dono se baat hui hogi. To dono ne confirm kar liya hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To process to aapka start ho gaya hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ji jaise maine aapko bataya tha. Ab usme kam se kam aap maan lijiye char panch din ka time lagega aapko refund aa jayega aapke account mein. Hamari side se wo ho chuka hai start.

Customer: Achcha char se panch din ke andar refund ho jayega confirm.

Executive: Haan matlab working days mein aap count karega.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai aap jaise aaj Thursday ho gaya to kal Friday ho gaya isme se Saturday Sunday mat count karke aap next week ke karega. Process ho gaya pura start.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai. Baki aapke Sahil se baat hui kuch matlab conflict vagera kuch nahi Sahil se nahi hui meri koi baat chit nahi hui.

Customer: Kuch bhi nahi hua?

Customer: Na. To matlab wo product ab nahi kar rahe product aur paise vagera kuch bhi?

Customer: Nahi. Nahi kar rahe na wo.

Executive: Achcha to matlab bilkul hi abhi kuch concern nahi hai usse. To aap kaise fir unse deal karenge?

Customer: Koi concern nahi hai.

Customer: Kya?

Customer: Aap kaise fir unse deal karenge matlab in corporation mein?

Customer: Main unse yahi deal hai last mera kuch nahi hai maine apne vakil ko documents sab use kar rakhe hain. Vakil sahab ne mere ko main to bas yahi hai ki aap logon se mera ye ho jaye refund to main turant file lagwa dunga uska.

Executive: Haan sir wo to hamari side se to ho hi gaya hai start jaise maine aapko bola hi tha aapko call karke.

Customer: Haan jaise hi jaise hi mere ko refund ho jata hai main turant uska file bana ke lagwa deta hu. Kyunki document already submit kar hi rakha hu.

Executive: Isme matlab wo to aap normal bhi kar sakte hain isme matlab yahan se normal normal nahi ho raha hai na wo apni map pe aaya hua hai.

Customer: Wo apni map aaya hua hai aur karane wala Sahil ji hai.

Executive: Aap banate jaldi kya hai. Achcha achcha. Aisa aisa aisa to hai nahi ki main Sahil ji ko beech mein nahi lunga. Sahil ji ko barabar case mein involved rakhunga main.

Executive: Achcha wahi cheez matlab isme kya raha uske baad wo bhi aisa paisa to hum nahi chhod sakte na paisa chahiye ya fir product chahiye?

Customer: Main wahi product product ka kya main aisa thodi na ghallega main ye batao. Kya karunga product ka jis time requirement tha need thi us time to mujhe diya nahi.

Executive: Nahi wo aapki baat bilkul sahi hai par ye to material aisa hai na ki aap wo to galat bata rahe hain na Sahil to Sahil to galat bata rahe hain.

Customer: Ab aadmi gusse mein agar ulta seedha nahi bolega to kya kahega ye batao. Bhai koi bhi aadmi agar paise de raha hai kisi cheez ke liye na to paisa refund ho raha hai na paisa mil raha wo material mil raha hai to us time aadmi kya karega. Last mein do baat bolega hi na.

Executive: Wo to hai hi sir par usme ko matlab ek tarah se kuch to baat banni chahiye na ya to fir hume apna paisa nikalwana hai ya fir product chahiye kuch to hoga na uske liye.

Customer: Maine maine Sahil ji ko barabar deal dal rakhi hai ki mujhe Diwali se pehle ka ki ya to aap do din ka time hai delivery dispatching date mujhe de do timing de do. Otherwise main aapka order accept nahi karunga. Main apna end pe clear hu.

Executive: Achcha. Kyunki Sahil ka hi mere paas mail aayi hai bola sir hum jo hai product deliver kara denge.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Product aap deliver kara doge.

Executive: Haan bola tha to dispatch ka time time line kyu nahi diya?

Customer: Ji ji. Uske hisab se hi thodi na chalunga main.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul.

Customer: Fir?

Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aapka yahan se to ho hi gaya process jaise maine aapko bataya hi tha aapka ho jayega.

Customer: Ye ye ye ye process kar do aap ye process karne ke baad automatic court mein khada kar dunga main inko. Theek hai. Aur main bata dunga fir in logon se galat commitment kaise ki jati hai kisi se.

Customer: Madam madam ko maine to delivery ke regarding unko ye bola tha ki aap logon ne mujhe bewakoof bana rakha hai. But unka bhi mere paas sara record hai ki ab humse material bhi paisa bhi lekar ke dikhao.

Executive: Achcha ye cheez unhone matlab kuch likh ke diya hua hai?

Customer: Return mein return mein hai.

Executive: Achcha unhone return mein likh ke di hui hai ki na hum paisa denge na material denge.

Customer: Yes. Tabhi to fasenge wo.

Customer: 420 mein tabhi to jayenge na aise thodi jayenge.

Executive: Haan wo cheez to galat hai agar matlab is baat pe udh gaye hain to.

Customer: 40000 itna lamba chauda amount nahi hai.

Executive: Ji. To uske 40000 ke chakkar mein wo apni registration ko band kara tak ki jab baat aa jayegi to main aapke pair pakdega bolna bhai kaise bhi settlement kar lo.

Customer: Wo to hai hi sir koi bhi hota hai ki har koi ye sochta hi hai.

Customer: Fir?

Customer: Nahi theek hai sir. But kahin na kahin kahin na kahin kahin na kahin badnami aap logon ki bhi honi hai. Ye bhi bata deta hu kyunki isliye honi hai jab main Sahil ji ko bar bar mail dal raha hu reply mang raha hu aur koi response nahi aa raha hai main unko time line ke regarding unko mail pe mail dali hai. Unhone respond nahi kiya aur baad mein wo aath 10 din baad mein bol rahe hain bola sir ye sir hum to aapko material refund kara sakte hain.

Customer: Koi baat nahi aap kuch bhi mat karao.

Customer: Ji ji wo to aapki baat theek hai jab material ki zarurat thi jab nahi mila to fir baad mein aap kya hi karoge. Par wahi hota hai na sir team ka bhi thoda sa ye aa jata hai ki unko ek process follow karna hota hai.

Customer: Koi baat nahi process follow theek hai process follow hota hai process follow ke liye maine 10 se 12 days wait kiya hai.

Executive: Ji ji ji.

Customer: 10 to 15 days maine wait kiya hai aisa nahi hai nahi kiya hai.

Executive: Ji ji. Nahi wo sahi baat hai aapki sir tabhi main matlab tabhi main aapko bhi usme bol rahi thi ki sir thoda sa aapka dhairya hai mere ko pata hai wo cheez problem aap face kar rahe hain.

Customer: Aur main aapko ye bhi clearly bata deta hu yahi reason hai main aap logon se cancellation mang raha hu.

Executive: Haan sir mujhe pata hai is cheez ka.

Customer: Haan to aapna refund mang rahe hain mujhe ye cheez pata hai.

Customer: Bilkul.

Executive: Ji tabhi maine sach mein main matlab bilkul helpless thi tabhi maine aapko apne senior se call karai ki isme matlab kya cheez hum kar sakte hain. To aap mujhe ye bata mujhe ye batao na meri kami yahan thi maine usko order de kar ke galat kiya kya?

Executive: Nahi sir isme galti to nahi main aapko bol sakti ki aapne jab sara pehle hi payment kara hua hai.

Customer: Jab meri unse sari cheeze clear ho rahi thi baat chit ho rahi thi aur maine unko bola ki theek hai aap jo hai meri aapse koi bhi cheez ke regarding talking ho rahi hai theek hai sir hum ye charges ye charges nahi lenge ye nahi lenge jo aapko chahiye wo hum denge aap karo no issue.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul.

Customer: To ye trust hi hota hai sab kuch. Haan sahi baat hai. Trust mera trust mera wahan tut sa ja raha tha jahan mere ko company se mere upar dabav aa raha tha ki sir order ka kya hua order ka kya hua main un logon ko respond nahi kar pa raha ye log respond nahi kar rahe hain to.

Customer: Hmm. Haan wo aapka fir aapka bada order nikal jata na aapke hath se wo bhi aapki baat sahi hai.

Customer: Sahi kar sakte hain na sab samne wala bilkul is baat pe aa gaya hai ki nahi karna kuch bhi deliver to kya hi ho sakta hai fir isme.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Koi baat nahi sir yahan se jaise maine aapko bataya hi tha ki process ho gaya start to ho jayega aapka refund. Char panch din mein jaise maine aapko bata hi diya.

Customer: Haan to theek hai char panch din mein ye refund ho jayega aur wo madam Radhika Behl jo hai usko plus unke jo boss hain Sanjeev Dutta unko automatic main khada kar lunga Bhiwadi court mein aayenge to yahin pe.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Aayenge aayenge to yahin pe hi jayenge kahan.

Customer: Hmm hmm. Are ek bar nahi aayega do bar nahi aayega teen bar nahi aayega teesri bar mein automatic warranting karwa dunga.

Executive: Nahi wo to aapki wahi wali baat hai na fir matlab kuch na kuch to nikalwana padega karna padega aise to nahi chhod sakte.

Customer: Haan. Aisa to hai nahi process system ko main nahi janta hu.

Executive: Ji ji ji.

Customer: Hmm. Is cheez mein main bhi matlab kuch nahi kar pa rahi hu to isliye main aapse kya hi bolu abhi.

Customer: Actually meri galti main maan leta aapke department ka Yogesh ji hai Yogesh ko aap jante hoge jinhone mujhe ye dilaya tha aapka ye.

Executive: IndiaMART ka subscription.

Customer: Yes. To maine already unko four to five days pehle jab hamari sari baat chit ho rahi thi aur jab material deliver nahi kar raha tha to maine unko already inform kiya tha unhone personally mere liye Sanjeev Dutta ji se baat kiya bola sir aisa kyun ho raha hai bola aapka staff jo hai commitment kar raha hai commitment pe pura nahi utra hai fir commitment kariye fir usse pura nahi utra hai to last mein aadmi ka sabar ka band tutata hai koi bhi ho.

Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai bilkul sahi baat hai sir.

Customer: Kyunki teen teen bar agar failure hota hai koi bhi aadmi to samne wala ka itna right to banta hai ki wo sunayega paise de raha hai wo koi ehsan nahi kar raha hai.

Executive: Wahi baat hai na ki aap already pehle sara payment kar chuke hain agar part payment bhi hota to bhi chaliye ye hota hai ki full payment karne ke baad agar wo deliver karne ke liye tayar hai to wo bhi hum karte bhi hain. But humne full payment karke bhi isliye face kar rahe hain.

Customer: Jo usne commitment kari thi delivery time ke liye regarding wo sari return mein hai mere paas Sahil ji ne to bas ye dekha hai ki haa inhone thoda bahut jo hai misuse kiya hai language. Wo bhi is tarike se ki aap log bewakoof ho gaye ho ya ye ho gaye ho kyun nahi material deliver kar rahe ho aap is tarike se kyun kar rahe ho maine ye sari cheeze boli hai usme main thodi na mana kar raha hu nahi boli.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul.

Customer: To aadmi last mein jab wo aadmi ke hath mein kuch nahi lag raha hai dono side se ja raha hai to wo to bolna padega.

Executive: Wo to hai hi sir wo to matlab kuch bhi nahi dikhega to insan to bolega hi. Aur sabse badi baat hai payment kari hui hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Koi baat nahi sir ho jayega to aapko product mil jayega aisa nahi hai aapne kal kuch kara hua hai process but yahan se to maine aapko bataya hi tha refund ka ho gaya starting.

Customer: Haan to product ka to ab mujhe requirement hai hi nahi hai kyunki wo size alag tha to isliye uska to requirement hai hi nahi mujhe. Rahi ab is cheez ke liye regarding ki ab mujhse payment kaise nikalna hai wo main automatic follow up le lunga. Are jahan 40000 gaya to usme se 20000 main vakil ko de dunga 40 to aayega na 20 to bachega aur uska jo jahan tak baat aayegi ghum fir kar ke jis din settlement pe ya kisi bhi cheez ke regarding baat aayegi us din wo wo 40 bhi dega uska 20 bhi dega plus jo penalty charge hai wo bhi dega. Otherwise aaram se teen mahina dal roti khane jao.

Executive: Sahi bole sir main is baat pe matlab main kya hi bol sakti hu ab.

Customer: Nahi isme isme ye bata do mere main yahan pe galat tha is cheez mein ye bata do aap.

Executive: Nahi sir main galat to aapko nahi bol sakti ki aap galat the jab aap sara payment karke rakhe hain aapko delivery ka ek date mila tha ki is time tak delivery ho jayegi uske baad bhi aapne ek hafte wait kara hai tab bhi product nahi mil raha hai to fir sahi mein aap fir kya hi matlab samne wala to us cheez pe ye ho gaya ki na usko deliver karna hai na refund karna hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Chaliye un un theek hai iska process karo aur process to ho gaya hai sir start bas abhi char panch din mein aapko aapke account mein bhi show kar jayega.

Executive: Theek hai. Okay thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Refund not received yet.

- No response from Tauseef Raja.

- Product not delivered, no refund initiated.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund process has started.

- Refund will be credited in 4-5 working days.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will file a case after refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, delivery, commitment, legal action
